mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zone(admin_code, zone_name, zone_content) VALUES(#{admin_code}, #{zone_name}, #{zone_content})
mapper.update: UPDATE zone SET zone_name=#{zone_name}, zone_content=#{zone_content} WHERE zone_code=#{zone_code}
UPDATE zone SET zone_state=0 WHERE zone_code=#{zone_code}
mapper.select: SELECT zone.zone_code, zone.admin_code, zone_name, zone_content, zone_state FROM zone JOIN admin ON zone.admin_code=admin.admin_code WHERE admin.company_code=#{companycode}
SELECT z.zone_code, z.admin_code, z.zone_name, z.zone_content, z.zone_state, i.image_code, i.image_file FROM zone z JOIN image i ON z.zone_code=i.zone_code WHERE i.zone_code=#{zone_code}
